snippet: Mr. Christy was a young physicist working on the Manhattan Project who came up with a critical insight that led to the creation of the world’s first atom bomb.
abstract: Robert F Christy, physicist who came up with critical insight that led to the creation of the world's first atom bomb, dies at age 96.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Christy was a young physicist working on the Manhattan Project who came up with a critical insight that led to the creation of the world’s first atom bomb.

headline.seo: Robert F. Christy, Atom Bomb Physicist, Dies at 96
headline.main: Robert F. Christy, Atom Bomb Physicist, Dies at 96
headline.print_headline: Robert F. Christy, Atom Bomb Physicist, Dies at 96
